Download Cleaner - Quick Start (Windows 10/11)

1) Right-click the ZIP file and choose "Extract All..."
2) Open the extracted folder
3) Double-click "Run Download Cleaner.bat"
4) Review the file preview in the window
5) Type Y and press Enter to clean your Downloads folder, or type N to cancel

What the app does:
- Moves recognized file types into folders (Documents, Images, Archives, Executables)
- Moves old files into Archive
- Leaves unknown file types in place

Important:
- The app targets the currently logged-in user's Downloads folder
- Keep "Run Download Cleaner.bat" and "download-cleaner.exe" in the same folder
